snippet.title: Outpost: Infinity Siege - Prototype Trailer - "You have a gun, an outpost, ready to save the world?"
snippet.description:
Follow us to enter the upcoming Playtests:
Wishlist: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1566690/
Discord: https://discord.gg/qaHEVpxWnm
Twitter: https://twitter.com/teamranger2022
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/TeamRangerStudio/
Reddit: https://www.reddit.com/r/OutpostInfinitySiege/

About the game
Command Mobile Outpost and take Protoslag Gun to venture deep into the Signet surveillance off-limit area where dangers lurk in the dark. Collect unique Weapon Units. Amp up the firepower of the Outpost that fights with you. This game is about TD, FPS, and RTS all at the same time.
